event.descr:
This notification, if the agent is so configured, may be sent when the system has detected a material change in physical condition of the hardware

vmwSubsystemType %parm[#1]%;

unknown(1) chassis(2) powerSupply(3) fan(4) cpu(5) memory(6) battery(7) temperatureSensor(8) raidController(9) voltage(10)

vmwHardwareStatus %parm[#2]%;

unknown(1) normal(2) marginal(3) critical(4) failed(5)

vmwEventDescription %parm[#3]%;

vmwEnvHardwareTime %parm[#4]%;
event.logmsg: vmwEnvHardwareEvent trap received vmwSubsystemType=%parm[#1]% vmwHardwareStatus=%parm[#2]% vmwEventDescription=%parm[#3]% vmwEnvHardwareTime=%parm[#4]%

event.descr:
ESX Specific version of this notification, if the agent is so configured, may be sent when the ESX Operating System has detected a material change in physical condition of the hardware

vmwSubsystemType %parm[#1]%;

unknown(1) chassis(2) powerSupply(3) fan(4) cpu(5) memory(6) battery(7) temperatureSensor(8) raidController(9) voltage(10)

vmwHardwareStatus %parm[#2]%;

unknown(1) normal(2) marginal(3) critical(4) failed(5)

vmwEventDescription %parm[#3]%;

vmwEnvHardwareTime %parm[#4]%;
event.logmsg: vmwESXEnvHardwareEvent trap received vmwSubsystemType=%parm[#1]% vmwHardwareStatus=%parm[#2]% vmwEventDescription=%parm[#3]% vmwEnvHardwareTime=%parm[#4]%
